tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_cleansing_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_description TEXT,
    dataset_name TEXT,
    transformation_query TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE data_cleansing_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(50),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status ENUM('pending', 'completed', 'failed'),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE dataset_transformation_tasks (
    transformation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transformation_name VARCHAR(50),
    transformation_description TEXT,
    transformation_status ENUM('processing', 'completed', 'failed'),
    completed_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE data_cleansing_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_description TEXT,
    table_name TEXT,
    column_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE dataset_metadata (
    dataset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name TEXT,
    created_by TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transformation_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT
)
